citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1330 on
21-MAR-19.
Contact was made at the facility gate with the manager who stated he had a conflict and was not available for the
remainder of the day.
